rmaven 0.1.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

    Fetch an artifact from a repository into the local .m2 cache

    fetch_artifact.Rd

    Fetch an artifact from a repository into the local .m2 cache

    fetch_artifact(
  groupId = NULL,
  artifactId = NULL,
  version = NULL,
  ...,
  coordinates = NULL,
  artifact = NULL,
  repoUrl = getOption("rmaven.default_repos"),
  nocache = FALSE,
  verbose = c("normal", "quiet", "debug")
)

    Arguments

    groupId

    optional, the maven groupId,

    artifactId

    optional, the maven artifactId,

    version

    optional, the maven version,

    ...

    other maven coordinates such as classifier or packaging

    coordinates

    optional, but if not supplied groupId and artifactId must be, coordinates as a coordinates object (see as.coordinates())

    artifact

    optional, coordinates as an artifact string groupId:artifactId:version[:packaging[:classifier]] string

    repoUrl

    the URLs of the repositories to check (defaults to maven central)

    nocache

    normally artifacts are only fetched if required, nocache forces fetching

    verbose

    how much output from maven, one of "normal", "quiet", "debug"

    Value

    the .m2 path of the artifact

    Examples

    fetch_artifact(artifact="io.github.terminological:r6-generator:main-SNAPSHOT:pom")
#> executing: /home/runner/.cache/rmaven/mvnw org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-dependency-plugin:3.3.0:get -Dartifact=io.github.terminological:r6-generator:main-SNAPSHOT:pom
#> Warning: running command ''/home/runner/.cache/rmaven/mvnw' org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-dependency-plugin:3.3.0:get -Dartifact=io.github.terminological:r6-generator:main-SNAPSHOT:pom' had status 1
#> [INFO] Scanning for projects...

fetch_artifact(coordinates = as.coordinates("org.junit.jupiter","junit-jupiter-api","5.9.0"))
